title: PropertyContentToString (Function)
text:
FUNCTION PropertyContentToString : STRING
Tries to build a string represenation for some property types

rows.Name: objectID
rows.Comment:
optional to encode enums, to ignore set objectID.typ :=
CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_OBJECT_TYPE._OBJ_MAX_SIZE

rows:
optional to encode enums, to ignore set propID :=
CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_PROPERTY_ID._PROP_MAX_SIZE
